author: R Vimal Kumar
text:
Kausalya being taken for recording a declaration before a Judicial Magistrate on Monday. — Photo: M. Periasamy

The Palladam Judicial Magistrate, Krishnan, on Monday recorded the statement of S. Kausalya, wife of Dalit youth V. Shankar (22) who was killed in Udumalpet recently, under Section 164 of Criminal Procedure Code.

Ms. Kausalya, a caste Hindu girl, who sustained injuries in the attack allegedly at the behest of her family members who did not approve of her love marriage , deposed before the judge for almost two-and-a-half hours. The statement was taken as part of the investigation.

She was brought from Coimbatore Medical College and Hospital with police protection.

Her father Chinnasamy was brought to a judicial magistrate court at Udumalpet on Monday from Madurai Central Prison.

The Magistrate ordered 7 days police custody for Chinnasamy.

title: Kausalya’s statement recorded
